verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God's love is so wonderful (3x)
Oh! Wonderful love!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So high, you can't get over it (3x)
Oh! Wonderful love!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So deep, you can't get under it (3x)
Oh! Wonderful love!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So wide, you can't get around it (3x)
Oh! Wonderful love!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
God's love is so wonderful (3x)
Oh! Wonderful love
